ThemeIsle Gutenberg Animation
--------------------------

You can include this library like this::

```
if ( class_exists( '\ThemeIsle\GutenbergAnimation' ) ) {
	\ThemeIsle\GutenbergAnimation::instance();
}
```

## Credits

Animate.css, https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
